SELECT t.id, t.from_wallet_id AS fromWalletId, t.to_wallet_id AS toWalletId, t.category_id AS categoryId, fw.name AS fromWalletName, tw.name AS toWalletName, c.name AS categoryName, c.icon AS categoryIcon, t.title, t.notes, t.amount, t.type, t.created_at AS createdAt, t.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN wallet fw ON t.from_wallet_id = fw.id AND fw.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN wallet tw ON t.to_wallet_id = tw.id AND tw.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.id AND c.user_id = #{userId} WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.soft_deleted = FALSE
AND t.type = #{filter.type}::transaction_type
AND (t.from_wallet_id = #{filter.walletId} OR t.to_wallet_id = #{filter.walletId})
AND t.category_id = #{filter.categoryId}
AND t.created_at >= #{filter.fromDate}::date AND t.created_at < (#{filter.fromDate}::date + INTERVAL '1 day')
AND t.created_at >= #{filter.fromDate}::date AND t.created_at < (#{filter.toDate}::date + INTERVAL '1 day')
